segments.text: I notice the girl standing next to the boy, looking up at him with such hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be waiting for a cookie, her hand open and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for her, hoping she gets what she wants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is trying his best to reach the jar, balancing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get the cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely unaware of what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad that she's missing this moment with the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a mix of anticipation and sadness, watching the children try to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everything turns out okay for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
